short_summary: Purchase of office furniture to be delivered and installed in Gatineau, Quebec
description: Procurement for office furniture under PSIB Stream and contains products that are Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA). Delivery and installation required between 2024-04-19 and 2024-11-30.
